I'm sorry, but after so many hours I can say that I don't think this game is worth your time. It can be quite fun to discover what is new, but we are in 2022 almost and this game is really starting to fall behind. As a veteran player, there is just not enough done to shake the game up or play with the meta. I think the game is a good time for beginners, but it will get stale after a while.

I'm just gonna say that I like this game what more do you want from me? xddd

I mainly play as survivor even though I die first like all the time lmao just because I'm really trash at killer but I also find playing the killer still fun anyway. There are many different survivors/killers you can play as which is also really cool so you don't get bored from playing the same killer and or survivor. I also personally actually like the killers more then the survivors just character/backstory wise.

I only really play this game for fun I can't really get myself to be that sweaty type of person when playing this game most of the time anyway.
 
Also my favorite killers are the Trickster and the Huntress and will most likely always be my favorite killers :)

The game started out with some issues, but after a year it has become a really solid experience. I would recommend it to anyone who even remotely likes horror games, multiplayer games, or even oddly enough competitive games. 

There are some bugs here and there, but not near as bad as there once were, and it's sure a hell of a lot better than any similar games that are out there right now. The dev team also has a weekly stream where they address issues and talk to the community. Honestly for the amount of potential entertainment you can get, this game is a steal at $20. Highly recommended.

Se lo compro un amigo para jugar conmigo, y su primera impresion fue lo que en realidad es el juego. Cuando se dio cuenta no lo podia devolver por que ya tenia las 2 horas de juego y el 80% del tiempo estubo en pantallas de carga y buscando partida; al entrar en la primera partida era un asesino friendly. Si no fuera por que el juego engancha, estaria totalmente abandonado.

Tras el ultimo parche 1.5.3 aparecen nuevos bugs que te impiden iniciar partida con amigos. te saca al lobby donde se buggea y te obliga a cerrar, o te echa del juego diciendo que no tienes internet. Rezemos para que no falle la hoguera, y asi seguira manteniendo esa sensacion de hogar, hogar bugueado.

When I just bought this game, I thought that it was not worth your money, but then I realized that this game is addicting and there are many interesting things in it. I do not jelly that I gave money for such an excellent game! I advise everyone to buy it.

This game is awesome, I have been very impressed so far with the game mechanics. It seems like any time there are any bugs they are fixed relatively quickly. I would say however I would love for there to be some kind of story mode, like in Left for Dead. The game does at time feel repetitive, but itâ€™s especially fun to enjoy with friends. At times some of the killers seem to be way over powered, and the Haddonfield map, is way too small, especially when playing with an overpowered player. I would say the enjoyment of this game all depends on the players you are matched with. Some of the killers like to camp, which make it impossible to save your allies, so if you do start playing, don't do that, it just makes the game boring. Iâ€™d also like to see a few other changes like a better chance to escape hooks.

After 500 hours I've definitelly enjoyed the game. It takes time to learn all the perks and jukes, but it gets crazy fun. Being a survivor becomes an obsession, but to get good, I've played few killers just to learn their weaknesses. Can't wait to see where this game goes. I've gotten all the DLC content, and Mikey is definitelly my favorite so far. Brings out the classic horror game feel.

Pros:
-graphics
-story line
-team-survival
-physics engine is superb
-natural movements
-realistic speed, good match lengths
-perks and special abilities
-each character has their own power
-ability to spectate


Cons:
-some trashy players make the game terrible at times
-killers overpowered at certain points
-no proximity talk (PLEASE)
-slow development for fixing biggest complains
-glitches on killing animations
-connection/lag even with great internet
-matchmaking sometimes makes no sense (level 1 with level 18 players)

If you want to play a great team-effort game, ready to help others to survive, this game is great. Don't expect great killers all the time, they do exist, but it's like 50/50 chance you'll get some killer who will camp or face-camp you.
